headline: Briefs: Local lawmaker co-sponsoring human trafficking legislation
author: Marion Star
sentences:
Governor DeWine honorarily renames three Ohio State Parks ahead of Super Bowl LVI
COLUMBUS — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine and Ohio Department of Natural Resources (ODNR) Director Mary Mertz have temporarily renamed three Ohio State Parks to honor current and past players of the Super-Bowl-bound Cincinnati Bengals.

Evan McPherson, whose game-winning kicks in the divisional playoff and AFC Conference Championship games helped send the Bengals to the Super Bowl, will be celebrated at Paint Creek State Park in Bainbridge with the moniker of "Evan McPherson Extra Point Creek State Park."
